## Practicals associated with this workshop

Workshop practicals are included as part of the :package: \[mvw\]. They can be accessed using the `run_tutorial()` function.

-   `mvw::run_tutorial("Introduction")`
-   `mvw::run_tutorial("Calibration")`
-   `mvw::run_tutorial("Bednet")`
